title: Multi-Cloud Key Management Patterns
subtitle: Coordinating AWS KMS, Azure Key Vault, and GCP KMS
learning_objectives: Inventory encryption keys across cloud providers
Coordinate incident response for key compromise

content.text:

content.text:

3. Plan unified monitoring and alerting.
4. Draft a key compromise response playbook.
